articles.author: Hannah Paine
articles.title: American's take on Tip Top bread sparks ridicule: 'Saddest thing I've read in my entire life' - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: Tip Top bread is a Kiwi staple - and an American thinks it's the "most amazing bread".
articles.content: Tip Top is one of the most common breads you can find in Aussie and NZ supermarkets. Photo / Instagram @tiptopthe1One of the most exciting parts of visiting other countries is discovering just how di… [+3135 chars]
